attributes.action: force all mobile operators to make 0800 calls free on mobile phones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all mobile operators should make 0800 / free phone number calls from mobiles free and not charge for the calls.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "force all mobile operators to make 0800 calls free on mobile phones."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12538.asp

Prime Minister's Office
